chucklebooth.co.uk Homepage

Photo booths are becoming a must-have for parties, weddings, corporate events, proms, childrens parties or any other occasion. We are a family-run business in Nottinghamshire providing professional photo booth hire to Mansfield, Nottingham & all surrounding areas.

Check out all of the amazing features

Up to EIGHT People

It's fun with more people! The chucklebooth can take up to 8 people.

Hilarious Props

We have LOTS of funny hats, wigs & other props to ensure you and your guests are laughing non-stop.

USB of all Photos

You'll get a FREE USB Memory stick containing every image that was taken at your event.

4 Hours Included

Your guests will have plenty of time to have fun in the chucklebooth.

Photos on Facebook

We'll put all the photos on facebook for you (if you want us to) making it easy to share with family & friends

Personal Message

All photos taken at your event can have a message of your choice.

Unlimited Use

There's no limit on how many photos your guests can take. Keep snapping away & have a great time!

Online Album

Photos will be available on this website for FREE download. Albums can be password protected too.

Friendly Assistant

A member of staff will stay for the duration of the event to ensure everything runs smoothly.

All of the above for a Single Flat FEE
